title: The Complete Web Developer in 2024: Zero to Mastery
description: Master full-stack web development by building projects with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Machine Learning, and more.

title: CS50's Introduction to Computer Science
description: An entry-level course taught by David Malan, covering fundamental concepts in computer science and programming.

title: JavaScript: Understanding the Weird Parts
description: An advanced course that dives deep into the core mechanisms of JavaScript, helping you to master the language.

title: Python for Everybody
description: A comprehensive course by Dr. Charles Severance that teaches you Python programming from the basics to more advanced concepts.

title: Full-Stack Web Development with React
description: Learn front-end and hybrid mobile development, with server-side support, using React, React Native, and Node.js.
